name: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai
address: Apollo Bunder Road The Taj Mahal Palace, Colaba, 400001 Mumbai, India
description: Built in 1903, the iconic Taj Mahal Palace stands majestically opposite the Gateway of India, overlooking the Arabian Sea. Sprawled over 2.

reviews.comment: “The hotel is full of history, wonderfully located, you are tread are kings and queens!”

“Food wxcellent. Taj Palace is one of Mumbai’s landmarks. It is part of all tours. No need for city tour if u are staying at Taj. It IS the city (at least from a tourist point of view). Walking outside is an experience in itself. Perfectly safe but...”
“Very classical architecture, lots of art and historical heritage in one place”
“The property itself is very nice and lives up to the Taj brand in terms of ambience and comfort.”

“Aman is very friendly and helpful he made sure to explain everything in this hotel you can see how proud he is in his workplace
Rest of the staff are also friendly
One of the best Indian restaurant I tried in a hotel
The swimming pool area is great”
